bibl.title: The Statue(s) of Philitas (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309 Col. X.16-25 and Hermesianax fr. 7.75-78 P.).
bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. x, 16-25 = 63 Austin-Bastianini and HERMESIANAX, fr. 7, 75-78 Powell. Considers whether the two poems refer to different statues or to the same one, and reviews the evidence for statue-location.
HARDIE Alex, The Statue(s) of Philitas (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309 Col. X.16-25 and Hermesianax fr. 7.75-78 P.).
